name: PlatyPanic
description:
PlatyPanic is a 1 v 1 platformer, made by team Clogged Up Toilets, where your goal is to get your Platypus to the goal first. Use your dedicated 'That Again'™-button to let your opponent repeat their last action. Moved to the right? The other Platypus will dash to the right. Jump? Same here! With our patent pending 'best of 3 model' you'll have a mighty good time.

Enjoy!
